document_name: 091221 MOFA IT - Signed PD extension 2010 - 2012 - SIS.pdf
http://www.undp.org/content/dam/undp/documents/projects/SAU/00046085/091221 MOFA IT - Signed PD extension 2010 - 2012 - SIS.pdf

outputs.output_descr: The aim of this project is to increase the efficiency and productivity of MOFA activities and to ensure the implementation of the National Plan for Communications and Information Technology through switching to electronic services and transactions. The activities of this project include: broadening the scope of the e-services and e- transactions available, developing human capacity, improving technological infrastructure, improving connectivity, increasing access to the Web and applying quality standards.

project_descr: e-Services & e-Transaction Development & Knowledge Society at the Ministry of Foregin Affairs MOFA -Phase#1
